before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1i2i0","text":"Equilibrate to room temperature (RT) - Single Cell 3’ v3.1 Gel Beads (2000164), RT Reagent B (2000165) and Template Switch Oligo (3000228)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cedhm","text":"Place on ice – RT Enzyme C (20000085/2000102) and Cells suspension","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8cc1","text":"Prepare Master Mix  - Prepare  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"sql5","text":"The Chromium Single Cell Gene Expression Solution upgrades short read sequencers to deliver a scalable microfluidic platform for 3’ digital gene expression by profiling 500-10,000 individual cells per sample. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gs83","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmatr","text":"A pool of ~3,500,000 10x Barcodes are sampled separately to index each cell’s transcriptome. It is done by partitioning thousands of cells (or nuclei) into nanoliter-scale Gel Beads-in-emulsion (GEMs), where all generated cDNA share a common 10x Barcode. Dual Indexed libraries are generated and sequenced from the cDNA and 10x Barcodes are used to associate individual reads back to the individual partitions.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4j9ng","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qe9i","text":"This protocol outlines the process for generating Gel Beads-in-emulsion (GEMs) by combining barcoded Single Cell 3’ v3.1 Gel Beads, a Master Mix containing cells, and Partitioning Oil onto Chromium Next GEM Chip G. To achieve single cell resolution, cells are delivered at a limiting dilution, such that the majority (~90-99%) of generated GEMs contain no cell, while the remainder largely contain a single cell.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5irgn","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89pga","text":"This protocol details the GEM Generation and Barcoding procedures.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Fold the lid back until it clicks to expose the wells at 45 degrees","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv5jp","text":"Visually compare the remaining volume in rows labeled 1-2. Abnormally high volume in one well relative to other wells may indicate a clog.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qtpo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c37g5","text":"Slowly aspirate   GEMs from the lowest points of the recovery wells in the top row labeled 3 without creating a seal between the tips and the bottom of the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"avoh6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bsk1u","text":"Over the course of ∼ , dispense GEMs into the tube strip on ice with the pipette tips against the sidewalls of the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ugt8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":20,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tn34","text":"GEM-RT Incubation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"438ut","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9rj9","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ggnm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ljnh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e8h07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_3":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["130","150","124"],"data":[["Lid Temperature","Reaction Volume","Run Time"],["53°C","125 µl","~55 min"],["Step","Temperature","Time"],["1","53°C","45 min"],["2","85°C","5 min"],["3","4°C","Hold"]],"guid":"A2E5F51F357B474E9409529DDD205634","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d6lfb","text":"Thermocycler protocol.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Lid Temperature","Reaction Volume","Run Time"],["53°C","125 µl","~55 min"],["Step","Temperature","Time"],["1","53°C","45 min"],["2","85°C","5 min"],["3","4°C","Hold"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pve9","text":"Store at   for up to   or at   for up to a week, or proceed to the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cungj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
